overview: You will discover the history of the palace as well as the masterpieces it houses. This is the most complete tour imaginable, covering the gardens, the royal apartments, the Hall of Mirrors, the Petit Trianon, the Royal Chapel and the Opera.  This private visit will enable you to see the treasures which astound the 10 million people who visit the castle and gardens every year.
tagline: A private visit to the greatest castle in the world !
title: Versailles, the visit
